title: Search Implementation with Elasticsearch
content:
# Search Implementation - Elasticsearch

## Architecture

### Cluster Setup
- 3-node Elasticsearch cluster
- 1 master, 2 data nodes
- Version: 8.x
- Cloud provider: AWS Elasticsearch

### Index Structure
**products_v1:**
```json
{
  "mappings": {
    "properties": {
      "id": {"type": "keyword"},
      "name": {"type": "text", "analyzer": "english"},
      "description": {"type": "text"},
      "category": {"type": "keyword"},
      "price": {"type": "float"},
      "rating": {"type": "float"},
      "in_stock": {"type": "boolean"}
    }
  }
}
```

## Search Features

### Full-Text Search
```
GET /products_v1/_search
{
  "query": {
    "multi_match": {
      "query": "wireless headphones",
      "fields": ["name^3", "description"]
    }
  }
}
```

### Filters
- Price range
- Category
- Brand
- Rating (4+ stars)
- Availability

### Auto-Complete
Suggest-as-you-type using completion suggester.

### Fuzzy Matching
Handle typos with fuzziness=AUTO.

### Synonym Support
phone → smartphone, mobile
laptop → notebook, computer

## Relevance Tuning
Field boosting:
- name: 3x
- description: 1x
- tags: 2x

## Performance
- Query latency: <100ms (p95)
- Index size: 50GB
- Doc count: 1M products
- Refresh interval: 1s

## Monitoring
- Query rate
- Latency percentiles
- Index health
- Disk usage

## Data Sync
- Real-time via Kafka
- Bulk reindex nightly
- Delta updates every 5 minutes
